summary:
**Summary of Material Information (Neuren Pharmaceuticals – ASX Announcement 7 August 2025):**  

- **Q2 2025 DAYBUE™ (trofinetide) net sales**: US$96.1 million, up **14% YoY** (Q2 2024) and **14% QoQ** (Q1 2025).  
- **Royalty income to Neuren**: A$14.7 million (Q2 2025), up **16% YoY** and **9% QoQ**.  
- **Full-year 2025 guidance (Acadia)**: DAYBUE US net sales of **US$380–405 million**, implying **A$62–67 million** royalty income for Neuren (AUD/USD 0.65).  
- **Commercial progress**:  
  - Record patient shipments (987 in Q2, up from 954 in Q1).  
  - Acadia expanded sales force by **~30%** and initiated named patient programs in **Europe** and **Rest of World**.  
  - European approval expected **Q1 2026**.  

*Note: No material updates on capital structure, liquidity, or other valuation-sensitive items.*
